welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Andres, Philippines! Get ready to experience the stunning natural beauty, crystal-clear waters, and warm hospitality that this charming city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything that San Andres has to offer.

restaurants.name: Maracuyá
restaurants.description: Maracuyá is a latin american restaurant located in Flores.

restaurants.name: Maple & Tocino
restaurants.description: Maple & Tocino is a breakfast spot located in Flores.

restaurants.name: Cool Beans
restaurants.description: Cool Beans is a latin american restaurant located in Flores.

restaurants.name: Ristoranto Terrazzo
restaurants.description: Ristoranto Terrazzo is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: La casa de Enrico
restaurants.description: La casa de Enrico is a diner located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves international and domestic flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights for Cebu Pacific, AirAsia, and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for regional and smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout all terminals, with a 2-hour time limit per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Baler Airport, handling air freight and logistics.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
